title: Pepperoni Pizza Loaf Recipe
directions: Preheat oven to 350°. On a greased baking sheet, roll out dough into a 15x10-in. rectangle. In a small bowl, combine the egg yolks, Parmesan cheese, oil, parsley, oregano, garlic powder and pepper. Brush over the dough.
Sprinkle with the pepperoni, mozzarella cheese, mushrooms, pepper rings, green pepper and olives. Roll up, jelly-roll style, starting with a long side; pinch seam to seal and tuck ends under.
Place seam side down; brush with egg whites. Do not let rise. Bake 35-40 minutes or until golden brown. Warm the pizza sauce; serve with sliced loaf. Yield: 10-12 slices.
ingredients: 1 loaf (1 pound) frozen bread dough, thawed
2 cups (8 ounces) shredded part-skim mozzarella cheese
1 can (4 ounces) mushroom stems and pieces, drained
1 can (15 ounces) Ragú® Homemade Style Pizza Sauce
